source.name: Product Recall Data API
source.description: USASearch's Product Recall Data API returns data on product safety and recalls from three federal government agencies: (1) food safety data from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention; (2) car safety data from the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration; and (3) product safety data from the Consumer Product Safety Commission. The feeds are processed every 30 minutes, when possible.
